
public class TVtext {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
      TV t1 = new TV("三星","韩国",60,12800);
      TV t2 = new TV("小米","中国",70,9999);
      TV t3 = new TV("海尔","中国",65,8888);
      TV t4 = new TV("苹果","美国",60,16800);
      
      t1.show();
      t2.show();
      t3.show();
      t4.show();
	}

}
